When Eira dies, return her to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on her. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
Whenever you attack, remove a counter from any number of permanents you control. Create X 1/1 white Warrior creature token that are tapped and attacking, where X is the number of counters removed this way.
